state_description: This screen is part of the Smart Scan feature in CleanMyMac X. It provides an overview of the system cleaning process, including cleanup of junk files, malware protection, and performance optimization. The scan is currently in progress.

enables.name: Review Details
enables.description: View detailed information about the cleanup process and the files identified for removal.

enables.name: Stop
enables.description: Stop the ongoing Smart Scan process.
